original: 但衛溫等人因水土不服、瘴癘作怪，士兵染上惡疾、病死者眾多，衛溫和諸葛直黯然撤軍，僅從夷州帶回數千土著返國覆命。
text: However, Wei Wen and others were unaccustomed to the water and soil, miasma, the soldiers contracted sickness, and many people died of illness. Wei Wen and Zhuge withdrew their troops and only brought back thousands of natives from Yizhou to return to the country.
